summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 1996 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHEN DRIVING THE VEHICLE IT "SHIMMIES" ALL OVER THE HIGHWAY.  HE STATED THAT THE  STEERING BOX IS DEFECTIVE BECAUSE ONE OF THE ATTACHMENT LUGS ON THE BOX IS BROKEN.  THE LOWER CONTROL ARMS HAVE BEEN RE TORQUE-D BY THE OWNER APPROXIMATELY ONE WEEK AGO AND SO FAR THE FAILURE HAD NOT RETURNED.  THE DEALER WAS UNABLE  TO DETECT THE FAILURE.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE IS APPROXIMATELY 50,000.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE IS APPROXIMATELY 115,000.
